municipal_schemes.name: Special Assistance (Bijzondere bijstand)
municipal_schemes.short_description: Financial support for necessary and unexpected costs that you cannot pay yourself.
eligibility_plain_language: You live in Amsterdam or Weesp
You have low income and limited savings
The costs are necessary and exceptional
The costs are not covered by another scheme
required_documents: Invoices or quotes for the exceptional costs
Rental contract and rent proof (if housing-related)
how_to_apply: Check whether your cost type is listed on the website
Apply online or request a paper form
Upload or send the required documents
notes: Decision time depends on whether all documents are provided.

municipal_schemes.name: Stadspas
municipal_schemes.short_description: City pass that gives discounts for sports, culture, and activities.
eligibility_plain_language: You live in Amsterdam or Weesp
You have a low income and limited savings
how_to_apply: Apply online via the Stadspas website
Receive the pass by mail if approved
